attributes.action: Allow an independant company to deal with broadband provision cease orders and remove existing or misplaced broadband 'markers - tags' on the phone line.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want an independant company from the one we have (or do decide to join with) for supplying our broadband/adsl service, (Bt Wholesale as an example of such a possible company) in order to deal with outstanding, on going, problematic Cease orders and misplaced 'Broadband Markers and Tags' on telephone lines.
Currently, only the company that you actually receive the broadband service from is allowed to deal with such requests, causing a major back log of issues and allowing existing service providers to take control of a consumers freedom of choice (in situations where the service providers will not or seem unable to remove a service or a marker off the telephone line).
